name: Can you crash it ?
description:
Quit button in the menu don't work (ALT+F4 to exit game).

This game was made under 3 hours for a tri jam (https://itch.io/jam/trijam-97).

It's a puzzle game you solve by found a bug  preventing players to enjoy your game.

There is only one level, it's more a POC than a final game but maybe you can get some inspiration from it.

No sound, I didn't have time, graphic made with Pain.
